TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ChartEvents_SeriesChangeEventHandler(int SeriesIndex, int PointIndex);
.class public auto ansi sealed ChartEvents_SeriesChangeEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ChartEvents_SeriesChangeEventHandler(SeriesIndex As Integer, PointIndex As Integer)
public delegate void ChartEvents_SeriesChangeEventHandler(int SeriesIndex, int PointIndex);

Docs.param: The offset within the collection for the changed series.
The offset within the collection for the changed point.
Docs.summary: A Delegate type used to add an event handler for the event. The SeriesChange event occurs when the user changes the value of a chart data point.
